author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hna Reduced Holding In Deutsche Bank To Approximately 8.8 Percent As Of February 16, 2018 - C-QUADRAT Spokesman
text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - Deutsche Bank AG:
* HNA REDUCED HOLDING IN DEUTSCHE BANK TO APPROXIMATELY 8.8 PERCENT AS OF FEBRUARY 16, 2018 - C-QUADRAT SPOKESMAN
* A FURTHER REDUCTION OF OUR HOLDING IS NOT PLANNED - C-QUADRAT SAYS OF HNAâ€˜S HOLDING IN DEUTSCHE BANK
* HNA WILL CONTINUE TO BE A SIGNIFICANT INVESTOR IN DEUTSCHE BANK - C-QUADRAT SPOKESMAN SAYS Further company coverage:
